TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComponentCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ComponentCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供標準的元件相關命令集，其含有預先定義的按鍵輸入動作和 屬性。

span.span: Provides a standard set of component-related commands, which have predefined key input gestures and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的命令類別和其他命令命令程式庫類別，例如和，用於代表一組應用程式設計人員經常遇到的常見命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令只代表的執行個體不實作邏輯的命令。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 實作邏輯繫結至透過命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果（命令目標），會執行的邏輯控制項上執行命令命令可能無法提供命令目標，因此應用程式寫入器會負責寫決定的邏輯方式命令目標會處理命令。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic that performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer is responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target handles the command. 許多控制項提供實作邏輯，不過，許多命令程式庫中的命令。Many controls do provide implementation logic, though, for many of the commands in the command library. 比方說，類別會提供邏輯命令，命令，命令，命令，並命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 請參閱特定控制項類別，如需詳細資訊的類別文件。See the class documentation for particular control classes for more information. 如需有關命令和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand ExtendSelectionDown { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand ExtendSelectionDown
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtendSelectionDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ExtendSelectionDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示向下延伸選取範圍命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Extend Selection Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令以擴充選取範圍向下表示。This command indicates the intention to extend the selection downward. 不一定會回應任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

Public Shared ReadOnly Property SelectToHome As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ SelectToHome { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得代表 Select To Home 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Home command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命令表示以擴充選取的項目從目前的項目，第一個項目。This command indicates the intention to extend select the items from the current item to the first item. 不一定會回應任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得表示選取下一頁命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Page Down command.
The command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令表示要從目前的項目向下移動一個頁面中選取。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item down one page. 不一定會回應任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令表示要從目前的項目向上移動一個頁面中選取。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item up one page. 不一定會回應任何給定的物件; 此命令的實作在許多情況下該命令的回應中的實作會是應用程式寫入器的責任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
